name: Offroad Pickup Truck: Hill Dri
description:
Choose your favorite powerful car in an offroad driving fun & mountain adventure 2018 game and drive it through bumpy tracks. In Offroad Pickup Truck: Hill Drive select your favorite ride and start discovering the most dangerous and curvy tracks. Enjoy mountain world exploration with mountain hill stunts driving. The hills are full of obstacles, drive and steer the off road hill car with safety. There is no crazy traffic regulation. Escape the public crowded areas, drive far away the mountain tracks and do not block the roads. This game is the best hill car driving simulator experience to fulfill your mountain driving fever with a beautiful off-road environment. It is a real entertainment for all offraod driving lovers with amazing car physics and smooth car controls. Realistic physics, High quality vehicles, Dynamic camera angles. enjoy the powerful engine sounds you will love racing against time. The clock is ticking you have to pass through checkpoints and aerial obstacles or flame circles with high speed car jump.


*Key Features*
1. Explore hill climbing levels
2. Realistic traffic system with 3D environment
3. Huge open world with Realistic driving simulator
4. Realistic simulation & passenger’s animation
5. Multiple camera angles
6. Amazing 3D graphics & realistic sounds
